meanings.definition: A person or thing that flakes.
meanings.sent1: The flakers left a trail of crumbs behind them.
meanings.sent2: I saw two flakers playing in the snow.
meanings.sent3: The flakers in the bakery were always running out of bread.
meanings.sent4: Her excuses were like flakers, constantly falling apart.
meanings.sent5: The flakers in the cereal were so crunchy and delicious.

meanings.sent1: We invited the flakers to join our team.
meanings.sent2: The flakers gathered at the park for a picnic.
meanings.sent3: The flakers on the tree looked like colorful leaves.
meanings.sent4: The flakers in the crowd cheered loudly.
meanings.sent5: The flakers on the ground sparkled in the sunlight.
